message: Let's split it 60/40. I believe starting with a fair offer is best.
Alice, your offer was generous, but I'm aiming a bit higher. How about a 55/45 split in my favor?

Bob, I appreciate your counter-offer, but I believe my initial offer was already fair.  I'm willing to meet in the middle - 55/45 my way this time. Let's close this deal and avoid further losses from inflation.
